text: Shovit Basnet is a Nepali Film Industry actor and director. He had directed dozens of super-hit Nepali films. He is the father of Nepali actor Salon Basnet. Basnet is the creative director of Nepali Film Industry. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Nepalese movie actors Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Kathmandu
title: Shovit Basnet
